storyInfo: Paradise is broken, but life goes on.

attributes.content: Hey, wing-man.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'm talking to you! Hey, come back!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Assuming that 'wing-man' is an epithet for Sankta, there are multiple individuals who fit the name.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'm talking to you. I know your name is Federico.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You really know how to piss people off, don't you?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I don't have time for your crap.
attributes.name: Raimund
Raimund
attributes.content: That guy, Oren...

attributes.name: Raimund
attributes.content: He said that Gerald, he... for us, for me and Fortuna...
Is it true? Is Gerald really—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Yes, Gerald is dead.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Now that you answered, I'm starting to wish you didn't.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I don't get it... how could it be...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, but this is a fact.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ha... what are you sorry about?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Bah...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Keep your distance, wing-man. Close your eyes. Don't look at me.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That thing on your head is way too bright. It hurts my eyes. I just need a second to adjust.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Gerald gave you his knife. The choice was his. It's not my place to argue.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: But I can't let you take it away.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You have to know what it means to take the weapon of a Sarkaz mercenary.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: It means carrying on the legacy of his name.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Yes. That's why I'm going to take it back from you, along with Gerald's name, and his honor.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I challenge you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You won't win.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have to.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: As long as I draw breath, I'll find you, and challenge you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Don't you dare underestimate me.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I refuse your challenge.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: H-How dare you?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'm challenging you to an honorable—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Gerald was a mere hunter. There is no legacy to inherit in this knife.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Exactly what I said.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you want a knife that inherited the name of a Sarkaz mercenary, I have never been in possession of one. You're wasting your time challenging me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If you want the knife of Gerald the Hunter, then yes, I am currently in possession of it.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why you...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Do you want it?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...Burdenbeast dung.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: This was Gerald's treasure. He wouldn't never let me take it just like that.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You keep it safe.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You just wait... I'll lead my people to find a new path, just like Gerald did.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'll come back for it when I've earned it.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will keep it safe, until then.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Raimund...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Stop gawking. I think he can take it.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What about you? You said you couldn't hold a gun anymore. Are you... praying with it?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I have a feeling it will answer me again.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Can I still use it, Serpilia?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Why not? It may be a little old, but you can trust my handiwork.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I used to study antique guns, you know.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Lately, though, I'm finding new things a little more interesting.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Do new things scare you at all?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: There's no point being scared. One wants to learn more, in spite of the fear.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Somebody once told me that techniques exist to be used.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I didn't understand at the time. But now...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Now?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I understand a little. I'm a craftsman, and I'm responsible for the weapons I craft.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Well, set that aside for a bit. What about you?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Are you ready to leave with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: H-How did you know what I was going to say?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: No empathy needed to guess your thoughts.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It's not such a big deal when you put it that way, is it?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You wouldn't come looking for me at this hour with that solemn look on your face, if you were planning to come back to Laterano.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I promised to come quietly and accept the punishment I deserved... but now I'm trying to run away.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: S-So...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: So, will I let you go?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Take a guess.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Your whole deal here is kind of a headache. You'll have to wear a hood all the time, if you live in Laterano.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I-I see, I guess that won't work...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Not that it'll be much better anywhere else.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You'll need to hide your horns, your appearance, and your gun.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: And I'll still be your warden. You'll have to keep in touch with me, no matter where you go, as long as you live.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You won't cause me any trouble, will you?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: —Er, um.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Wait, you're letting me go? W-Won't you get into trouble for that?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Worst case scenario, I quit my job at the Curia.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That was a joke.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It's true that I'll have some reports to write when I get back. I'll think about whether to get started on a resignation letter after that.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Anyway, you owe me more than a pizzelle now.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Th-Thank you... thank you so much.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Are we... still kin?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Does it matter? You're not getting off the hook, kin or not.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I want those pizzella next time I see you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The convoy is almost here. The abbey can start moving once it's refueled.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, this was a tricky case, even though the location wasn't that far from Laterano. I think I should borrow a bed at the abbey, get some rest.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I didn't see you do anything particularly tiring, Richele.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Weren't you pretending that you didn't know anything?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Or should I thank you for not being lazy enough to dump all the evidence linked to the Church of the Deep into the sewers?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Don't be so uptight, Oren.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'm sure Federico remembers the Sarkaz mercenary's dossier better than I do. And you and Lemuen are definitely more familiar with Church of the Deep cases than I am.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Plus, don't you think we're starting to get along a little bit, after you gave up empathy?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Why are you bringing that up?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: No reason. Just, sometimes it's better to know less about a guy, like how you have to close one eye when you shoot.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Just to make it clear, though, I took Lemuen's instructions about confirming whether the abbey had anything to do with the Church of the Deep seriously.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: At the end of the day, I suppose we can all sleep better at night.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You're lucky... or should I say, we're lucky.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The monastery gets the supplies it needs to return to Laterano. The disruption to the inhabitants was minimal.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The fallen girl has gone with the Sarkaz. Laterano will be able to find her, and the Sarkaz, if need be.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Laterano's image has not been materially affected.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Things don't turn out so well every day.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I prayed for a smooth trip to Laterano, safe from bandit attacks.
attributes.name: Male Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: We should be fine once we get to Laterano.
attributes.name: Male Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: I hope so! The emissaries from Laterano don't look like they've ever been hungry, and their clothes are brand new. I envy them.
attributes.name: Female Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: How do they plant their crops? Or do they give everyone a gun to hunt with?
attributes.name: Female Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Who knows? I can't imagine. I can't imagine what I would do with my time, if I didn't have to spend all my time fixing houses and making tools.
attributes.name: Male Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: I'm trembling, and I can't tell whether it's from excitement or fear.
attributes.name: Female Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Let's pray. Our faith will protect us.
attributes.name: Male Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Well, we did our best, didn't we?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: As for whether things will turn out well in the end...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Do you know where Mamma went?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: A child? I thought everyone was gathered up here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Mamma's not here... but she came back last night!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Yeah, Mamma brought us a gift last night. We lent it to a sleeping man...
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Sleeping?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: He was sleeping really deep! He must have been having a nice dream.
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: An abbey built upon a mobile plate, moving again after being stranded for a decade, almost becoming one with the land...
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: An impressive sight, the convergence of destruction and rebirth.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: You seem troubled. Do tell, if you feel unwell.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Your transformation is yet incomplete. The path ahead will be laborious.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: They...
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: Will the Laterans treat those children well?
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: I believe so. The sitting pope is known for moderation and benevolence. They will likely be taken in by foster parents and grow up in Laterano.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Traveling with the fallen angel, and with the eyes of Sankta from the Curia on them, it is unlikely that your kin will face any retribution.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: I'm glad to hear that...
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: Only one thing, Bishop Aulus.
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: They're not my kin anymore.
attributes.name: Hyman

attributes.content: If that is what you think, then that is what it will be.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: The stranded Paradise is no more. It is time for us to set out.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: Once again, we welcome you, Hyman.
attributes.name: Aulus

attributes.content: What are your plans?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Sinners cannot be choosers.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: You may have had the intention to cause harm, but at the end of the day, you didn't do any real damage.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Personally, I see no problem, but Velliv might be a little stricter where Iberia is concerned...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Ah, it doesn't seem like you're very happy with that answer.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I apologize for the discourtesy I showed, Reverend Nuncio.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I sense your sincerity. I accept your apology.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But I also sense that it's not what you really want to say.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's not an easy thing, judging oneself...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: It is the truth that I fell to despair, and knelt before the malice in my heart.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: What is more deserving of punishment: Harm caused out of benevolence, or malice not put into action?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: To me, it's the former.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: An idea could be fleeting, or it could take root silently, biding its time.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: How could you know that this is simply the result of a single moment of weakness?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: What would this place be like, if I chose another path?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I can't say that I've purged the caprices from my mind... I can't even say that I still believe in our laws...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But you still feel it, don't you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes, I do...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Every waking moment, I prayed that the people would be given their due, prayed that this little corner of Paradise would not slip through my fingers.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But I've waited for so long...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Too long. So long that I began to doubt that the very existence of faith was simply a self-imposed conceit.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: How does it feel?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Despair, fear, sorrow... what else? The feeling of...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Incredulity.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: How do we doubt something that exists in one's own mind?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: It means you've begun to doubt yourself... with terrible consequences, if one is unable to dispel the doubt.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: If even faith could be false, then how much of Stefano is real?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I wanted to understand. I tried to understand. But I overestimated myself.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We could never truly understand another. 'Understanding' remains precious, fleeting, even with the incredible power of empathy.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But having experienced so much, I have began to think that there are many emotions that can be communicated from one to another, and understood by most, even without the empathy.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: At least, I can say that I have began to understand the thoughts of a certain individual, not because I sensed something, but because I have experienced it myself...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I offer this to you, Bishop Stefano.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: The notebook of a cleric who spent some time here. I thought you might find it... interesting.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Perhaps, just like you, he had many questions, and many troubles.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You asked me about my plans.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I plan to return to Laterano. But not with the others.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: You mean you want to travel from here to Laterano by yourself?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: At your age...?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Please don't stop me. I must know. I must... rediscover my faith.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: If there comes a day when I atone for my sins, if there is truly such a thing as miracles, perhaps I will find my Laterano then.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: In that case...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I wish you the best of luck.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I hope you find your answer, Father Stefano.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We will meet again in Paradise.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: The old man says no more.
Age has taken its toll on him, as have the ordeals of last night. The lines of age fill every gap on his face.
Before Lemuen's eyes, Stefano Torregrossa walks out the door, his back slightly hunched.
Executor Federico, reporting in.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: As previously reported, the two nuncios are confirmed alive and well. They are expected to return to their posts in Laterano soon.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Plans are in place for Sanctilaminium Ambrosii to resume movement, setting a course for Laterano's outskirts. It is expected to arrive at its destination before Spring next year.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A request for supplies has been made to the Curia to ensure reliable mobility, and to meet the everyday needs of the inhabitants.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Forty-one of the one hundred fifty-three inhabitants of the monastery will depart the abbey. Serpilia will track and report on their subsequent movements.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The Sarkaz you mentioned?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I must admit my surprise, even though I had a hunch...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Whether it was the state of the abbey, the movements of the Church of the Deep, or Arturia...
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: You've done well, Federico.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I failed to meet your expectations.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Our intervention destabilized the situation at the abbey.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There were... three casualties.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You have doubts, my child.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I can rectify a wrong if I see it. I know many ways of stopping a sinner.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But at no point during this mission was there a clear course of action.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why was the result suboptimal, if no error was committed?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Are our laws suitable for all circumstances? If not, on what do I base my actions?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That is where my doubts lie.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't have an answer for you, Federico, because this is a question that troubles me as well.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: But I'm happy that you're beginning to ask these questions.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There is no need to be anxious. You're beginning to ask questions that you've never considered before. Is that not a big step forward?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: It's like pulling the cork from a bottle of fine wine. The hardest part is over. All that is left is to pour out what you want.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I'm going out to visit a friend, one that you're not unfamiliar with. I'll take your question to him.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: And share with you the answer he offers.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The towering statue is silent. The rays of the morning sun pour in. The executor ends the call and looks up.
The aging Sankta's silhouette begins to fade into the morning sun as he slowly walks away.
As she sees him off, Lemuen gets a feeling.
The feeling that she has not seen the last of the old man.
As he said himself—
Perhaps he will find the Laterano that he is looking for.
